1.0.name: wordpress/related-games
1.0.description:
A customizable widget which displays the latest related Games Tag based from AOL Games. It can be integrated anywhere in the blog. This widget shows up the lastest five Games related to tags placed on posts from the worlds most popular Gaming site http://www.games.com/. This is a very nice solution for all those wanting to share latest related games.

Feature List

  • customizable widget
  • displays a user-defined number of links
  • title shortening
